mapper.insert: insert into BBS (userid, title, bbscont, area, bbstime) values (#{userId},#{title},#{bbscont},#{area},now())
mapper.update: update BBS set title = #{title}, bbscont = #{bbscont}, area = #{area} where bbsnum = #{bbsnum}
mapper.select: select * from BBS where area = #{area} order by BBSTIME DESC limit 5
select * from BBS order by BBSNUM DESC limit #{skip},#{amount}
select * from BBS where userid = #{userid} order by BBSTIME DESC
select * from BBS where TITLE like '%${search}%'
